LanguageData.ExpectationsSlave.stages.0.label: destitute slave expectations
LanguageData.ExpectationsSlave.stages.0.description: I'm a slave of a destitute group. I expect nothing.
LanguageData.ExpectationsSlave.stages.1.label: poor slave expectations
LanguageData.ExpectationsSlave.stages.1.description: I'm a slave of a poor group. I expect very little.
LanguageData.ExpectationsSlave.stages.2.label: meager slave expectations
LanguageData.ExpectationsSlave.stages.2.description: I'm a slave of a group with meager holdings. I expect little.
LanguageData.ExpectationsSlave.stages.3.label: slave expectations
LanguageData.ExpectationsSlave.stages.3.description: I'm a slave. I don't expect much.
LanguageData.AteVeneratedAnimalMeat.stages.0.label: ate venerated animal meat
LanguageData.AteVeneratedAnimalMeat.stages.0.descript: I ate the flesh of a venerated animal. I've violated a most basic moral rule.
LanguageData.TameVeneratedAnimalDied.stages.0.label: venerated {ANIMALKIND} died
LanguageData.TameVeneratedAnimalDied.stages.0.descrip: A tame {ANIMALKIND} passed away. The death of such a noble beast is cause for sadness.
There are venerated animals around me.
I have some venerated animals around me.
I have many venerated animals around me.
I have a large number of venerated animals around me!
I have a huge number of venerated animals around me!
LanguageData.SlaughteredAnimal_Know_Prohibited_Mood.s: Someone slaughtered an animal! A tragic loss of a unique life.
LanguageData.SlaughteredAnimal_Horrible.stages.0.desc: I had to slaughter an animal! It was horrible to snuff out a mind like that.
LanguageData.SlaughteredAnimal_Know_Horrible_Mood.sta: Someone slaughtered an animal! What a horrible thing, to snuff out a mind like that.
LanguageData.SlaughteredAnimal_Disapproved.stages.0.d: I had to slaughter and animal. It was an ugly thing to do.
Someone slaughtered an animal. It's a sad thing.
LanguageData.ChangedIdeo_Know_Horrible.stages.0.label: recent apostasy
LanguageData.WearingDesiredApparel_Soft.stages.0.desc: It's good to be wearing {APPAREL_indefinite} in accordance with my beliefs.
LanguageData.WearingDesiredApparel_Strong.stages.0.de: It's great to be wearing {APPAREL_indefinite} in accordance with my beliefs.
We use automated turrets. It's absolutely abhorrent to give life-and-death decisions to a machine.
LanguageData.HasAutomatedTurrets_Horrible.stages.0.de: We use automated turrets. It's horrible to give life-and-death decisions to a machine.
LanguageData.HasAutomatedTurrets_Disapproved.stages.0: We use automated turrets. It's really ugly to give life-and-death decision to a machine.
We blinded someone over ideoligious beliefs! This is wrong!
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony_Self_Respected.stages.0: I was blinded in a righteous ceremony. Finally, I can start learning to see.
I was blinded in a righteous ceremony. Finally, I can start learning to see.
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony_Self_Sublime.stages.0.d: I was blinded in a righteous ceremony. Finally, I can start learning to see.
LanguageData.Blindness_Respected_Blind.stages.0.label: blind
LanguageData.Blindness_Respected_Blind.stages.0.descr: Now that my sight is gone, I can see clearly.
LanguageData.Blindness_Elevated_Blind.stages.0.label: blind
LanguageData.Blindness_Elevated_Blind.stages.0.descri: I can explore a greater awareness through my inability to see.
LanguageData.Blindness_Sublime_Blind.stages.0.label: blind
LanguageData.Blindness_Sublime_Blind.stages.0.descrip: I am free to explore the depths of my mind and the true reality without my sight limiting me.
LanguageData.Blindness_ArtificialBlind.stages.0.label: vision blocked
LanguageData.Blindness_ArtificialBlind.stages.0.descr: Blocking my vision gives my mind closer access to true reality. It's not as good as a permanent blinding, but it's acceptable.
LanguageData.Blindness_Elevated_HalfBlind.stages.0.de: I am on my way to enlightment through blindness.
LanguageData.Blindness_Sublime_HalfBlind.stages.0.des: I am on the verge of true enlightment through blindness.
LanguageData.Blindness_Elevated_NonBlind.stages.0.des: I wish to be blind so I can connect better with the true reality. Or, at a minimum, I should be blindfolded.
LanguageData.Blindness_Sublime_NonBlind.stages.0.desc: I wish to be blind so much. I need these physical sights gone so I can touch the true reality. At a minimum, I should wear a blindfold.
LanguageData.InstalledProsthetic_Abhorrent.stages.0.d: I had to install a prosthetic. This was deeply offensive to my beliefs.
LanguageData.InstalledProsthetic_Disapproved.stages.0: I had to install a prosthetic. This was clearly against my beliefs.
LanguageData.HasProsthetic_Abhorrent.stages.0.label: artificial part
LanguageData.HasProsthetic_Abhorrent.stages.0.descrip: I have an artificial body part in me. It's an abhorrent offense against everything I believe!
LanguageData.HasProsthetic_Disapproved.stages.0.label: artificial part
LanguageData.HasProsthetic_Disapproved.stages.0.descr: I have an artificial body part in me. I don't believe such things are acceptable.
LanguageData.HasNoProsthetic_Disapproved.stages.0.des: I don't have any artificial body parts. It's against my beliefs to be so unenhanced.
LanguageData.HasProsthetic_Approved.stages.0.label: transhumanist modded
LanguageData.HasProsthetic_Approved.stages.0.descript: This artificial body part matches my belief.
LanguageData.HasProsthetic_Approved.stages.1.label: transhumanist connected
LanguageData.HasProsthetic_Approved.stages.1.descript: The more artificial body parts I get, the stronger my expression of my beliefs.
LanguageData.HasProsthetic_Approved.stages.2.label: transhumanist enhanced
LanguageData.HasProsthetic_Approved.stages.2.descript: My connection to my belief is enhanced by my third artificial body part. But I could use more.
LanguageData.HasProsthetic_Approved.stages.3.label: transhumanist synchronized
LanguageData.HasProsthetic_Approved.stages.3.descript: Only two more artificial body parts are required to fully synchronize with my beliefs.
LanguageData.HasProsthetic_Approved.stages.4.label: transhumanist integrated
LanguageData.HasProsthetic_Approved.stages.4.descript: Five artificial body parts! I'm beginning to feel perfect integration with my beliefs.
LanguageData.HasProsthetic_Approved.stages.5.label: transhumanist transformed
LanguageData.HasProsthetic_Approved.stages.5.descript: It's as though I've left the weak flesh behind.
LanguageData.AteHumanMeat_Abhorrent.stages.0.label: ate human meat
LanguageData.AteHumanMeat_Abhorrent.stages.0.descript: I had to eat human meat. This is an offense against everything I believe.
LanguageData.ButcheredHuman_Abhorrent.stages.0.label: I butchered humanlike
LanguageData.ButcheredHuman_Abhorrent.stages.0.descri: I butchered a human being. This is an offense against everything I believe.
LanguageData.ButcheredHuman_Know_Abhorrent.stages.0.d: One of us butchered a human being. This is an offense against everything I believe.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparel_Abhorrent.stages.0.d: Wearing human leather is disturbing. Who could do this?
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparel_Abhorrent.stages.1.d: I'm dressed like an insane person.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparel_Abhorrent.stages.2.d: I think there may be a face on my clothes. Oh, no... my clothes *are* a face.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparel_Abhorrent.stages.3.d: I look like a freak from a horror show, and I feel like I'm in a horror show.
LanguageData.AteHumanMeat_Horrible.stages.0.label: ate human meat
LanguageData.AteHumanMeat_Horrible.stages.0.descripti: I had to eat human meat. This was a horrible thing.
LanguageData.ButcheredHuman_Horrible.stages.0.label: I butchered humanlike
LanguageData.ButcheredHuman_Horrible.stages.0.descrip: I butchered a human being. This was a horrible thing.
LanguageData.ButcheredHuman_Know_Horrible.stages.0.de: One of us butchered a human being. This was a horrible thing.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparel_Horrible.stages.1.de: I feel really uncomfortable with all this human leather apparel.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparel_Horrible.stages.2.de: Why am I wearing so much human leather? This is horrible!
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparel_Horrible.stages.3.de: I look like a freak, this is horrifying!
LanguageData.AteHumanMeat_Disapproved.stages.0.label: ate human meat
LanguageData.AteHumanMeat_Disapproved.stages.0.descri: I had to eat human meat. I believe such actions are wrong.
LanguageData.ButcheredHuman_Disapproved.stages.0.desc: I butchered a human being. I believe such actions are wrong.
LanguageData.ButcheredHuman_Know_Disapproved.stages.0: One of us butchered a human being. I believe such actions are wrong.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparel_Disapproved.stages.0: I should not be wearing human leather apparel.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparel_Disapproved.stages.1: I'm dressed in human skin. I do not like this.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparel_Disapproved.stages.2: Why am I wearing so much human leather apparel? We should have something else to wear for me...
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparel_Disapproved.stages.3: I should really wear non-human leather apparel. I look like a crazy person.
LanguageData.AteHumanMeat_Preferred.stages.0.label: ate human meat
LanguageData.AteHumanMeat_Preferred.stages.0.descript: I ate human meat. It makes me feel noble and strong.
LanguageData.NoRecentHumanMeat_Preferred.stages.0.des: It's been too long since I consumed any human meat. It feels wrong.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparel_Preferred.stages.0.d: I feel good wearing human leather apparel.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparel_Preferred.stages.1.d: I enjoy wearing the skin of others.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparel_Preferred.stages.2.d: I wear the faces of my enemies. This makes me happy.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparel_Preferred.stages.3.d: I look like a real cannibal. Who could doubt me?
LanguageData.AteNonCannibalFood_Horrible.stages.0.des: I had to eat food that wasn't taken from a human body. My beliefs strictly forbid such things.
LanguageData.AteHumanMeat_RequiredStrong.stages.0.des: I ate human meat, as every real human should.
It's been far too long since I consumed human. I should have eaten by now.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparel_RequiredStrong.stage: I enjoy wearing the faces of others.
This will scare them. All will know my power.
The faces on my clothes aren't smiling, but they make *me* happy.
The flesh! The flesh signals my triumph!
LanguageData.AteNonCannibalFood_Abhorrent.stages.0.de: I had to eat food that wasn't taken from a human body. This is absolutely against my beliefs.
LanguageData.AteHumanMeat_RequiredRavenous.stages.0.d: I ate human meat! The world is right, and I am as I should be.
LanguageData.NoRecentHumanMeat_RequiredRavenous.stage: Ravenous! It's been so long since I tasted the true flesh. This is wrong!
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparel_RequiredRavenous.sta: I enjoy wearing the suffering of others.
This will scare them. All will know my power.
The faces on my clothes aren't smiling, but they make *me* happy.
The flesh! The flesh signals my triumph!
They begged for help, but we refused. What a violation - am I even human any more?
They begged for help, but we didn't do anything. It was deeply wrong.
LanguageData.CharityRefused_Worthwhile_Beggars.stages: They asked for help and we did nothing. We should be trying harder.
LanguageData.CharityRefused_Essential_Beggars_Betraye: They begged for help and we betrayed them. Will I ever forgive myself?
LanguageData.CharityRefused_Important_Beggars_Betraye: They begged for help and we betrayed them. It was horrendous.
LanguageData.CharityRefused_Worthwhile_Beggars_Betray: They begged for help and we betrayed them. We cannot let this happen again.
LanguageData.CharityRefused_Essential_WandererJoins.s: Someone came looking for help, and we rejected them. What we did was inhuman.
LanguageData.CharityRefused_Important_WandererJoins.s: They were in need, and we rejected them. Only a terrible person does that.
They were in need, and we turned them away. We should have done better.
LanguageData.CharityRefused_Essential_ShuttleCrashRes: They were crashing, desperate for help, and we said no. How can I live with this?
LanguageData.CharityRefused_Important_ShuttleCrashRes: They were crashing, desperate for help, and we said no. It was so wrong.
LanguageData.CharityRefused_Worthwhile_ShuttleCrashRe: They were crashing, desperate for help, and we said no. It wasn't a good thing.
LanguageData.CharityRefused_Essential_RefugeePodCrash: They were hurt and need of help, and we didn't help. How can I live with that?
LanguageData.CharityRefused_Important_RefugeePodCrash: They were hurt and need of help, and we didn't help. Am I even a good person?
LanguageData.CharityRefused_Worthwhile_RefugeePodCras: They were hurt and need of help, and we didn't help. It wasn't the best.
LanguageData.CharityRefused_Essential_HospitalityRefu: They were desperate, and we didn't help. How could I be so inhuman?
LanguageData.CharityRefused_Important_HospitalityRefu: They were desperate, and we didn't help. We were obligated to help.
LanguageData.CharityRefused_Worthwhile_HospitalityRef: They were desperate, and we didn't help. It wasn't great.
LanguageData.CharityRefused_Essential_IntroWimp.stage: We refused to help a desperate noble. It was deeply immoral.
LanguageData.CharityRefused_Important_IntroWimp.stage: We refused to help a desperate noble. We should have tried harder.
LanguageData.CharityRefused_Worthwhile_IntroWimp.stag: We refused to help a desperate noble. Perhaps I am not as charitable as I thought.
LanguageData.CharityRefused_Essential_ThreatReward_Jo: We refused to help someone in real danger. I've deeply violated my beliefs.
LanguageData.CharityRefused_Important_ThreatReward_Jo: We refused to help someone in real danger. This will stick with me for a long time.
LanguageData.CharityRefused_Worthwhile_ThreatReward_J: We refused to help someone in real danger. It wasn't great.
LanguageData.CharityFulfilled_Essential_Beggars.stage: We helped beggars in need. I really am a good person!
LanguageData.CharityFulfilled_Important_Beggars.stage: We helped beggars in need. It was the right thing to do.
LanguageData.CharityFulfilled_Worthwhile_Beggars.stag: We helped beggars in need. It's good to be good to people.
LanguageData.CharityFulfilled_Essential_WandererJoins: We helped a desperate wanderer survive. I really am a good person!
LanguageData.CharityFulfilled_Important_WandererJoins: We helped a desperate wanderer survive. Helping others is the right thing to do.
LanguageData.CharityFulfilled_Worthwhile_WandererJoin: We helped a desperate wanderer survive. That's a good thing.
LanguageData.CharityFulfilled_Essential_ShuttleCrashR: We helped shuttle crash survivors. I really am a good person!
LanguageData.CharityFulfilled_Important_ShuttleCrashR: We helped shuttle crash survivors. It was clearly the right thing to do.
LanguageData.CharityFulfilled_Worthwhile_ShuttleCrash: We helped shuttle crash survivors. It was a good thing.
LanguageData.CharityFulfilled_Essential_RefugeePodCra: We helped a crashed refugee survive. I really am a good person!
LanguageData.CharityFulfilled_Important_RefugeePodCra: We helped a crashed refugee survive. Helping others is important.
LanguageData.CharityFulfilled_Worthwhile_RefugeePodCr: We helped a crashed refugee survive. It was good of me.
LanguageData.CharityFulfilled_Essential_HospitalityRe: We helped refugees. I really am a good person!
LanguageData.CharityFulfilled_Important_HospitalityRe: We helped refugees. Helping others is important.
LanguageData.CharityFulfilled_Worthwhile_HospitalityR: We helped refugees. It was good of us.
LanguageData.CharityFulfilled_Essential_IntroWimp.sta: We helped a royal in need. We really are good people!
LanguageData.CharityFulfilled_Important_IntroWimp.sta: We helped a royal in need. Helping others is important.
LanguageData.CharityFulfilled_Worthwhile_IntroWimp.st: We helped a royal in need. It was good of us.

LanguageData.CharityFulfilled_Worthwhile_ThreatReward: We helped someone under threat. That was pretty good.

LanguageData.SlabBed_Preferred.stages.0.description: I demonstrated my morality by accepting the discomfort of the slab bed.

LanguageData.AdministeredHardDrug_Horrible.stages.0.d: I administered a hard drug - not medical or even social. It was a horrible offense against my beliefs.

LanguageData.AteInsectMeat_Loved.stages.0.description: I ate some insect meat. So smooth and succulent.

LanguageData.KilledInnocentAnimal_Know_Abhorrent_Mood: An innocent, adorable animal was killed! That's murder!
LanguageData.KilledInnocentAnimal_Horrible.stages.0.d: I had to kill an innocent animal. It was almost like being forced to murder.

I had to kill an innocent animal. It was not something I approve of.

LanguageData.Darklight_Preferred_BlindingLight.stages: I cannot stand this terrible light. My senses are overwhelmed!

LanguageData.Darklight_Preferred_Darklight.stages.0.d: This dim light is perfect. I feel focused and energized.

LanguageData.GotLovin_Abhorrent.stages.0.description: I committed a lustful act that was absolutely abhorrent.

LanguageData.GotLovin_Disapproved.stages.0.label: act of desire
LanguageData.GotLovin_Disapproved.stages.0.descriptio: I committed an act of desire, but it was the wrong thing to do.

LanguageData.Lovin_Know_Approved.stages.0.label: initiated lovin'
LanguageData.AteMeat_Abhorrent.stages.0.label: ate meat
LanguageData.AteMeat_Abhorrent.stages.0.description: I had to eat meat. It was an abhorrent violation of everything I believe.
LanguageData.AteMeat_Know_Abhorrent.stages.0.label: ate meat
LanguageData.AteMeat_Horrible.stages.0.label: ate meat
LanguageData.AteMeat_Horrible.stages.0.description: I had to eat meat. It was a horrible violation of my beliefs.
LanguageData.AteMeat_Know_Horrible.stages.0.label: ate meat
LanguageData.AteMeat_Disapproved.stages.0.label: ate meat
LanguageData.AteMeat_Disapproved.stages.0.description: I had to eat meat. It's not something I approve of.
LanguageData.AteMeat_Know_Disapproved.stages.0.label: ate meat
LanguageData.AteNonMeat_Abhorrent.stages.0.label: ate non-meat
LanguageData.AteNonMeat_Abhorrent.stages.0.descriptio: I had to eat non-meat food. It was an abhorrent violation of the proper carnivore diet.
LanguageData.AteNonMeat_Know_Abhorrent.stages.0.label: ate non-meat
LanguageData.AteNonMeat_Horrible.stages.0.label: ate non-meat
LanguageData.AteNonMeat_Horrible.stages.0.description: I had to eat non-meat food. It was a horrible violation of the proper carnivore diet.
LanguageData.AteNonMeat_Know_Horrible.stages.0.label: ate non-meat
LanguageData.AteNonMeat_Disapproved.stages.0.label: ate non-meat
LanguageData.AteNonMeat_Disapproved.stages.0.descript: I had to eat non-meat food. It was an unacceptable deviation from the proper carnivore diet.
LanguageData.Mined_Know_Prohibited.stages.0.label: mined
LanguageData.Mined_Know_Prohibited_Mood.stages.0.desc: We mined a hole in the pure earth. What a terrible offense against nature.
LanguageData.MineableDestroyed_Prohibited.stages.0.de: I destroyed a natural wall. What a terrible offense against nature.
LanguageData.Mined_Horrible.stages.0.label: mined
LanguageData.Mined_Horrible.stages.0.description: I had to mine a hole. It was an offense against the earth.
LanguageData.Mined_Know_Horrible.stages.0.label: mined
LanguageData.Mined_Know_Horrible_Mood.stages.0.label: mined
LanguageData.Mined_Know_Horrible_Mood.stages.0.descri: Someone mined a hole in the pure earth. It was a horrible violation of nature.
LanguageData.MineableDestroyed_Horrible.stages.0.desc: I destroyed a natural wall. It was a horrible violation of nature.
LanguageData.Mined_Disapproved.stages.0.label: mined
LanguageData.Mined_Disapproved.stages.0.description: I had to mine a hole. I disapprove of harming the earth this way.
LanguageData.Mined_Know_Disapproved.stages.0.label: mined
LanguageData.Mined_Know_Disapproved_Mood.stages.0.des: Someone mined a hole in the pure earth. It's wrong to scar the world this way.
LanguageData.MineableDestroyed_Disapproved.stages.0.d: I destroyed a natural wall. It's wrong to scar the world this way.
LanguageData.AnyBodyPartCovered_Disapproved_Male.stag: I don't approve of covering myself, yet here I am doing it.
LanguageData.AnyBodyPartCovered_Disapproved_Female.st: I don't approve of covering myself, yet here I am doing it.
LanguageData.AnyBodyPartCovered_Disapproved_Memory.st: I concealed my flesh. It was wrong.
LanguageData.AnyBodyPartButGroinCovered_Disapproved_M: To stifle the skin is wrong. Only the groin should be covered.
LanguageData.AnyBodyPartButGroinCovered_Disapproved_F: To stifle the skin is wrong. Only the groin should be covered.
LanguageData.AnyBodyPartButGroinCovered_Disapproved_M: To conceal the skin is wrong, but I did it anyway. Only the groin should be covered.
LanguageData.GroinUncovered_Disapproved_Male.stages.0: I shouldn't have my private parts hanging out.
LanguageData.GroinUncovered_Disapproved_Female.stages: I shouldn't have my private parts hanging out.
LanguageData.GroinOrChestUncovered_Disapproved_Male.s: I don't like displaying my private parts or my chest.
LanguageData.GroinOrChestUncovered_Disapproved_Female: I don't like displaying my private parts or my chest.
LanguageData.GroinChestOrHairUncovered_Disapproved_Ma: It's wrong to be displaying myself like this. Only the face may be visible.
LanguageData.GroinChestOrHairUncovered_Disapproved_Fe: It's wrong to be displaying myself like this. Only the face may be visible.
LanguageData.GroinChestHairOrFaceUncovered_Disapprove: To show myself to the world is wrong. I should be completely covered up.
To show myself to the world is wrong. I should be completely covered up.
LanguageData.TradedOrgan_Abhorrent.stages.0.label: traded organ
LanguageData.TradedOrgan_Abhorrent.stages.0.descripti: I had to trade someone's organ. It's an abhorrent violation of everything I believe.
LanguageData.TradedOrgan_Know_Abhorrent_Mood.stages.0: Someone traded an organ! What an abhorrent, disgusting act.
LanguageData.SoldOrgan_Disapproved.stages.0.label: sold organ
LanguageData.SoldOrgan_Disapproved.stages.0.descripti: I had to sell someone's organ. I don't approve of such transactions.
LanguageData.SoldOrgan_Know_Horrible_Mood.stages.0.de: Someone sold an organ. It's horrible to trade human parts like machinery.
LanguageData.InstalledOrgan_Abhorrent.stages.0.label: installed organ
LanguageData.InstalledOrgan_Abhorrent.stages.0.descri: I had to install an organ in someone. It's an abhorrent violation of everything I believe.
LanguageData.InstalledOrgan_Know_Abhorrent_Mood.stage: Someone installed an organ. The body should be sacrosanct!
LanguageData.HarvestedOrgan_Abhorrent.stages.0.label: harvested organ
LanguageData.HarvestedOrgan_Abhorrent.stages.0.descri: I had to harvest someone's organ. It's an abhorrent violation of everything I believe.
LanguageData.HarvestedOrgan_Know_Abhorrent_Mood.stage: Someone took body parts from our fellow. It's a horrible thing.
LanguageData.HarvestedOrgan_Horrible.stages.0.label: harvested organ
LanguageData.HarvestedOrgan_Horrible.stages.0.descrip: I had to harvest someone's organ. It's a horrible offense against my beliefs.
LanguageData.HarvestedOrgan_Know_Horrible_Mood.stages: Someone took body parts from our fellow. It's a horrible thing.
LanguageData.Pain_Idealized.stages.0.label: minor pain
LanguageData.Pain_Idealized.stages.0.description: The pain grounds me. I appreciate it.
LanguageData.Pain_Idealized.stages.1.label: serious pain
LanguageData.Pain_Idealized.stages.1.description: The pain cleanses me. I like it.
LanguageData.Pain_Idealized.stages.2.label: intense pain
LanguageData.Pain_Idealized.stages.2.description: The pain purifies me. I need it!
LanguageData.Pain_Idealized.stages.3.label: mind-shattering pain
LanguageData.Pain_Idealized.stages.3.description: The pain makes me sublime! I wish to become it!
LanguageData.ExecutedGuest_Know_Abhorrent_Mood.stages: A guilty prisoner or guest was executed. It was justified, but still sad.
A prisoner or guest was euthanized. It was humane, but still sad.
A prisoner or guest was killed in cold blood. It seemed a bit evil.
A prisoner or guest died because the colony took body parts from him. It's horrible.
LanguageData.ExecutedColonist_Know_Abhorrent_Mood.sta: A guilty colonist was executed. It was justified, but still sad.
A colonist was euthanized. It was humane, but still sad.
A colonist was killed in cold blood. It seemed a bit evil.
A colonist died because someone took body parts from him. It's horrible.
LanguageData.InnocentPrisonerDied_Know_Abhorrent.stag: responsible for the death of a prisoner
LanguageData.InnocentPrisonerDied_Know_Abhorrent_Mood: One of our prisoners died despite being harmless. We should be able to take care of our prisoners. If we wanted them dead, we could have at least conducted an orderly execution rather than permit that barbarism.
I was responsible for the death of a prisoner. I must be truly evil.
LanguageData.ExecutedPrisoner_Horrible.stages.0.label: executed prisoner
LanguageData.ExecutedPrisoner_Horrible.stages.0.descr: I had to execute a prisoner. It's a horrible offense against my beliefs.
LanguageData.InnocentPrisonerDied_Horrible.stages.0.d: I was responsible for the death of a prisoner. Am I not a terrible person?
LanguageData.InnocentPrisonerDied_Know_Horrible.stage: responsible for the death of a prisoner
LanguageData.ExecutedPrisonerInnocent_Horrible.stages: I had to execute an innocent prisoner. It's a horrible offense against my beliefs.
I executed a guilty prisoner. Justice has been served!
LanguageData.GuiltyPrisonerDied_Respected.stages.0.de: I caused the death of a guilty prisoner. Let justice be served.
LanguageData.ExecutedPrisonerGuilty_Know_Respected_Mo: We executed a guilty prisoner. Justice has been served!
LanguageData.GuiltyPrisonerDied_Know_Respected.stages: responsible for the death of a prisoner
LanguageData.ExecutedPrisoner_Respected.stages.0.desc: I executed a prisoner. Victory has consequences.
LanguageData.PrisonerDied_Respected.stages.0.label: prisoner died (responsible)
LanguageData.PrisonerDied_Respected.stages.0.descript: I was responsible for the death of a prisoner! Now they'll all respect me.
LanguageData.PrisonerDied_Know_Respected.stages.0.lab: responsible for the death of a prisoner
LanguageData.Execution_Know_Respected_Mood.stages.0.d: We executed a prisoner or guest. Our dominance is clear!
LanguageData.NoRecentExecution.stages.0.label: no execution
LanguageData.NoRecentExecution.stages.0.description: It has been too long since we executed a prisoner. Are we so weak as to take no life?
LanguageData.Ranching_Central_AnimalMassPerCapita.sta: We have no animals at all! It's everything I am against.
We have far too few animals in our colony. We are not even close to living the right way.
We have few animals in our colony. It's not right.
It's good to be raising animals here, though more would be even better.
It's great we're raising lots of animals here, though a few more wouldn't hurt.
Our ranch is thriving. This is the right way to be.
LanguageData.Ranching_SowedPlant.stages.0.label: sowed human food plant
LanguageData.Ranching_SowedPlant.stages.0.description: I sowed a human food plant. It was wrong - humans should eat animals, and animals should eat nature-made plants.
LanguageData.NoRecentAnimalSlaughter.stages.0.label: no recent slaughter
LanguageData.NoRecentAnimalSlaughter.stages.0.descrip: It's been too long since we slaughtered a large animal.
LanguageData.RelicDestroyed.stages.0.label: relic destroyed
LanguageData.RelicDestroyed.stages.0.description: The relic was destroyed! A travesty!
LanguageData.RelicLost.stages.0.label: relic lost
LanguageData.RelicLost.stages.0.description: The relic has been lost! A travesty!
LanguageData.ScarificationCeremony_Know_Horrible.stag: We mutilated a fellow colonist over ideological beliefs! This is wrong!
I bear a new ritual mark to remind me of our truth.
I bear a new ritual mark to connected me to our truth.
LanguageData.ScarificationCeremony_Self_Extreme.stage: I bear a new ritual mark to bind me to our truth.
LanguageData.Scarification_Extreme.stages.0.label: scarified
LanguageData.Scarification_Extreme.stages.0.descripti: My dedication is written in indelible pain.
LanguageData.Scarification_Extreme.stages.1.label: not scarified
LanguageData.Scarification_Extreme.stages.1.descripti: This smooth skin is a travesty.
LanguageData.Scarification_Extreme.stages.2.label: insufficiently scarified
LanguageData.Scarification_Extreme.stages.2.descripti: This smooth skin is a travesty.
LanguageData.Scarification_Heavy.stages.0.label: scarified
LanguageData.Scarification_Heavy.stages.0.description: I bear the many cuts, as one ought to.
LanguageData.Scarification_Heavy.stages.1.label: not scarified
LanguageData.Scarification_Heavy.stages.2.label: insufficiently scarified
LanguageData.Scarification_Minor.stages.0.label: scarified
LanguageData.Scarification_Minor.stages.0.description: I bear the mark, as one ought to.
LanguageData.Scarification_Minor.stages.1.label: not scarified
LanguageData.Scarification_Minor.stages.1.description: I lack the appropriate ritual scar.
LanguageData.Scarification_Minor.stages.2.label: insufficiently scarified
LanguageData.Scarification_Minor.stages.2.description: I lack the appropriate ritual scar.
LanguageData.Skullspike_Desired.stages.0.label: skullspikes
LanguageData.Skullspike_Desired.stages.0.description: I've been around a few skullspikes recently. I like being reminded of our power.
LanguageData.Skullspike_Desired.stages.1.label: skullspikes
LanguageData.Skullspike_Desired.stages.1.description: I've been around quite a few skullspikes recently. All will fear us.
LanguageData.Skullspike_Desired.stages.2.label: skullspikes
LanguageData.Skullspike_Desired.stages.2.description: Surrounded by the dead grin of spiked skulls, nobody could doubt our power!
LanguageData.Skullspike_Disapproved.stages.0.label: skullspikes
LanguageData.Skullspike_Disapproved.stages.0.descript: I've been around skulls on spikes. Just a few of them, but it's still disturbing.
LanguageData.Skullspike_Disapproved.stages.1.label: skullspikes
LanguageData.Skullspike_Disapproved.stages.1.descript: There are quite a few skulls on spikes around here. It's rather disturbing.
LanguageData.Skullspike_Disapproved.stages.2.label: skullspikes
LanguageData.Skullspike_Disapproved.stages.2.descript: Why am I surrounded by a forest of heads on spikes? This is horrific.
LanguageData.SoldSlave_Know_Abhorrent.stages.0.label: sold slave
LanguageData.SoldSlave_Know_Abhorrent_Mood.stages.0.d: We solve someone into slavery. It was an abhorrent, barbaric act.
LanguageData.SoldSlave_Horrible.stages.0.label: sold slave
LanguageData.SoldSlave_Horrible.stages.0.description: I sold a person into slavery. I'm not sure I can forgive myself.
LanguageData.EnslavedPrisoner_Horrible.stages.0.label: enslaved prisoner
LanguageData.EnslavedPrisoner_Horrible.stages.0.descr: I forced someone into slavery. How can I justify that?
LanguageData.SoldSlave_Know_Horrible.stages.0.label: sold slave
LanguageData.SoldSlave_Know_Horrible_Mood.stages.0.de: We sold someone into slavery. What a horrible thing to do.
LanguageData.EnslavedPrisoner_Know_Horrible_Mood.stag: We enslaved someone. What a horrible thing to do to another human.
LanguageData.Slavery_Disapproved_SlavesInColony.stage: We're keeping slaves. Even if it's necessary, it's distasteful and I wish we wouldn't.
LanguageData.SoldSlave_Disapproved.stages.0.label: sold slave
LanguageData.SoldSlave_Disapproved.stages.0.descripti: I sold a person into slavery. I hope nothing terrible happens to them.
LanguageData.EnslavedPrisoner_Disapproved.stages.0.de: I enslaved a person. It's hard to justify such actions.
LanguageData.SoldSlave_Know_Disapproved_Mood.stages.0: We sold a person into slavery. We shouldn't have done that.
LanguageData.EnslavedPrisoner_Know_Disapproved_Mood.s: We enslaved someone. We shouldn't have done that.
We've got slaves. It means we're on the right path.
LanguageData.Slavery_Honorable_NoSlavesInColony.stage: Without slaves, nobody will respect us.
LanguageData.SoldSlave_Honorable.stages.0.label: sold slave
LanguageData.SoldSlave_Honorable.stages.0.description: I sold someone into slavery. It'll make people notice my stature.
LanguageData.EnslavedPrisoner_Honorable.stages.0.desc: I took someone into slavery. With no choice, they had to submit to me.
LanguageData.SoldSlave_Know_Honorable.stages.0.label: sold slave
LanguageData.SoldSlave_Know_Honorable_Mood.stages.0.d: We sold someone into slavery! A great display of our honor and power.
LanguageData.EnslavedPrisoner_Know_Honorable_Mood.sta: We enslaved someone. Now they know our honor and power!
LanguageData.SleptUsingSleepAccelerator.stages.0.desc: I slept with a sleep accelerator. It's helping me attain my true potential, as one should.
LanguageData.NeedNeuralSupercharge.stages.0.label: want neural supercharge
LanguageData.NeedNeuralSupercharge.stages.0.descripti: Without a neural supercharge, I'm running below my true capacity. It's depressing.
LanguageData.AgeReversalDemanded.stages.0.label: harmful aging
LanguageData.AgeReversalDemanded.stages.0.description: I'm getting old. I should get an age reversal in a biosculpter pod.
LanguageData.AgeReversalDemanded.stages.1.label: terrible aging
LanguageData.AgeReversalDemanded.stages.1.description: My youth is draining away. I should get an age reversal in a biosculpter pod.
LanguageData.AgeReversalDemanded.stages.2.label: horrific aging
LanguageData.AgeReversalDemanded.stages.2.description: I am trapped in a decaying prison of flesh! I need to get an age reversal in a biosculpter pod.
LanguageData.AgeReversalReceived.stages.0.label: received age reversal
LanguageData.AgeReversalReceived.stages.0.description: Aging and death have no hold on me. I am forever, as an enhanced human ought to be.
LanguageData.BioSculpterDespised.stages.0.label: used biosculpter pod
LanguageData.BioSculpterDespised.stages.0.description: My body was despoiled by the use of a biosculpter pod.
LanguageData.MinifiedTreeDied_Know_Prohibited_Mood.st: We extracted a tree from the ground and then let it die. Such things violations of nature should never be done.
LanguageData.MinifiedTreeDied_Know_Horrible_Mood.stag: We extracted a tree from the ground and let it die. It's wrong to scar nature this way.
LanguageData.MinifiedTreeDied_Know_Disapproved_Mood.s: We extracted a tree from the ground and let it die. It wasn't good to harm nature this way.
LanguageData.CutTree_Know_Prohibited.stages.0.label: cut tree
LanguageData.CutTree_Horrible.stages.0.label: cut tree
LanguageData.CutTree_Horrible.stages.0.description: I had to cut down a tree. It was horrible to scar nature this way.
LanguageData.CutTree_Know_Prohibited_Mood.stages.0.de: We cut down a tree. Such things violations of nature should never be done.
LanguageData.CutTree_Know_Horrible.stages.0.label: cut tree
LanguageData.CutTree_Know_Horrible_Mood.stages.0.desc: We cut down a tree. It's wrong to scar nature this way.
LanguageData.CutTree_Disapproved.stages.0.label: cut tree
LanguageData.CutTree_Disapproved.stages.0.description: I had to cut down a tree. It was wrong to scar nature this way.
LanguageData.CutTree_Know_Disapproved.stages.0.label: cut tree
LanguageData.CutTree_Know_Disapproved_Mood.stages.0.d: We cut down a tree. It wasn't good to harm nature this way.
LanguageData.GauranlenConnectionDesired.stages.0.desc: I am happily connected to a Gauranlen tree.
LanguageData.GauranlenConnectionDesired.stages.1.desc: Without a connection to a Gauranlen tree, I feel disconnected from nature.
LanguageData.GauranlenConnectionDesired.stages.2.desc: Without a connection to a Gauranlen tree, I feel disconnected from nature.
LanguageData.GauranlenConnectionDesired.stages.3.desc: Without a connection to a Gauranlen tree, I feel disconnected from nature.
LanguageData.GauranlenConnectionDesired.stages.4.desc: Without a connection to a Gauranlen tree, I feel disconnected from nature.
LanguageData.GauranlenConnectionDesired.stages.5.desc: Without a connection to a Gauranlen tree, I feel disconnected from nature.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.0.label: amazing trees
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.0.description: I am surrounded by several massive, beautiful trees. The glory of nature astounds me!
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.1.label: amazing tree
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.1.description: I very recently encountered a massive, beautiful tree - a physical seat of morality!
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.2.label: remarkable trees
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.2.description: I am surrounded by a lush forest.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.3.label: amazing tree
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.3.description: I recently encountered a massive, beautiful tree.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.4.label: rich forest
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.4.description: I was recently surrounded by a lush forest.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.5.label: full trees
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.5.description: I recently walked among many full trees.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.6.label: mixed trees
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.6.description: I recently walked among a wide variety of trees.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.7.label: full tree
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.7.description: I recently encountered a full tree.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.8.label: mini trees
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.8.description: I was recently surrounded by plenty of miniature trees.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.9.label: mini tree
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.9.description: I recently got to enjoy the company of a miniature tree.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.10.label: no tree
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.10.description: I haven't been around any trees in a while.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.11.label: no tree
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.11.description: I miss having trees around me.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.12.label: trees missed
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.12.description: It has been a while since I've been near a tree.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.13.label: trees missed
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.13.description: It has been too long since I've been near a tree.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.14.label: trees sorely missed
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.14.description: It has been way too long since I've been near a tree!
LanguageData.TreeDensityReduced.stages.0.label: healthy trees
LanguageData.TreeDensityReduced.stages.0.description: In the past quadrum, we didn't destroy many trees at all. Harmony with the trees is the basic foundation for a good life.
LanguageData.TreeDensityReduced.stages.1.label: trees disturbed
LanguageData.TreeDensityReduced.stages.1.description: In the past quadrum, we have destroyed trees we shouldn't have. It might have been necessary, but it is still an occasion for sadness.
LanguageData.TreeDensityReduced.stages.2.label: trees defaced
LanguageData.TreeDensityReduced.stages.2.description: In the past quadrum, we have destroyed a lot of trees we shouldn't have. I don't think this was necessary.
LanguageData.TreeDensityReduced.stages.3.label: trees damaged
LanguageData.TreeDensityReduced.stages.3.description: In the past quadrum, we have destroyed many trees we shouldn't have. This crime was not necessary, but we did it anyways.
LanguageData.TreeDensityReduced.stages.4.label: trees harmed
LanguageData.TreeDensityReduced.stages.4.description: In the past quadrum, we have destroyed an inexcusable number of trees. We need to do so much better.
LanguageData.TreeDensityReduced.stages.5.label: trees defiled
LanguageData.TreeDensityReduced.stages.5.description: In the past quadrum, we have destroyed an inexcusably large number of trees. The guilt lays heavy upon us.
LanguageData.TreeDensityReduced.stages.6.label: trees wrecked
LanguageData.TreeDensityReduced.stages.6.description: In the past quadrum, we have destroyed a very large number of trees. I can hear the leafy screams even now.
LanguageData.TreeDensityReduced.stages.7.label: trees ravaged
LanguageData.TreeDensityReduced.stages.7.description: In the past quadrum, we have destroyed a horrific number of trees. We are the blight on this universe.
LanguageData.KillWithNobleWeapon.stages.0.label: victory by noble weapon
LanguageData.KillWithNobleWeapon.stages.0.description: I have claimed victory while wielding a noble weapon!
LanguageData.UsedDespisedWeapon.stages.0.label: used despised weapon
LanguageData.UsedDespisedWeapon.stages.0.description: I used a filthy weapon which ought never to be used. How humiliating.
LanguageData.WieldingNobleOrDespisedWeapon.stages.0.d: I am wielding a {WEAPON_label}. Such a noble weapon!
LanguageData.WieldingNobleOrDespisedWeapon.stages.1.d: I am wielding a {WEAPON_label}. Such a detestable weapon!
LanguageData.IdeoBuildingMissing.stages.0.label: Missing {BUILDING_label}
LanguageData.IdeoBuildingDisrespected.stages.0.label: {BUILDING_labelCap} disrespected
LanguageData.IdeoBuildingDisrespected.stages.0.descri: We have {BUILDING_labelIndef}, but it needs to be placed in a room that satisfies the proper requirements.
LanguageData.ParticipatedInRaid_Respected.stages.0.de: I participated in a raid! That's how we do it!
LanguageData.ParticipatedInRaid_Required.stages.0.des: I participated in a raid! Now they'll all know me!
LanguageData.RecentConquest_Respected.stages.0.label: recent conquest
LanguageData.RecentConquest_Respected.stages.0.descri: We recently raided another faction. That'll show them who's boss.
LanguageData.RecentConquest_Respected.stages.1.label: no recent conquest
LanguageData.RecentConquest_Respected.stages.1.descri: It's been far too long since we raided anyone. They might stop fearing and respecting us.
LanguageData.RecentConquest_Required.stages.0.label: recent conquest
LanguageData.RecentConquest_Required.stages.0.descrip: We recently raided another faction. Their suffering will be their teacher.
LanguageData.RecentConquest_Required.stages.1.label: no recent conquest
LanguageData.RecentConquest_Required.stages.1.descrip: We haven't raided anyone for so long. We're despicable - helpless worms like the rest.
LanguageData.IdeoRoleLost.stages.0.label: Lost {ROLE_label} role
LanguageData.IdeoRoleEmpty.stages.0.label: No {ROLE_label}
I want to wear apparel appropriate for my role as {ROLE_labelDef}
LanguageData.IdeoLeaderResentmentStandard.label: Leader of different ideoligion
LanguageData.IdeoLeaderResentmentStandard.stages.0.de: I don't like having a {0} as a leader.
LanguageData.IdeoLeaderResentmentDisapproved.label: Leader of different ideoligion
LanguageData.IdeoLeaderResentmentDisapproved.stages.0: It's insulting to be ordered around by a {0}.
LanguageData.IdeoLeaderResentmentHorrible.label: Leader of different ideoligion
LanguageData.IdeoLeaderResentmentHorrible.stages.0.de: It's shameful to be ordered around by a {0}!
LanguageData.IdeoLeaderResentmentAbhorrent.label: Leader of different ideoligion
LanguageData.IdeoLeaderResentmentAbhorrent.stages.0.d: To accept direction from a {0} is utterly shameful and abhorrent.
LanguageData.WasEnslaved.stages.0.label: was enslaved
LanguageData.WasEnslaved.stages.0.description: They kept me as a slave. They forced me to suffer!
LanguageData.SleptInRoomWithSlave.stages.0.label: shared room with slave
LanguageData.SleptInRoomWithSlave.stages.0.descriptio: I had to sleep in the same room as a slave.
LanguageData.ConnectedTreeDied.stages.0.label: Gauranlen death
LanguageData.ConnectedTreeDied.stages.0.description: My tree... its calming presence became pure pain, then went silent. Its suffering echoes in my mind...
LanguageData.RelicsCollected.stages.0.label: all relics collected
LanguageData.RelicsCollected.stages.0.description: We found all of our sacred relics!
LanguageData.BiosculpterPleasure.stages.0.label: biosculpter pleasure cycle
LanguageData.BiosculpterPleasure.stages.0.description: Every part of me is somehow better at feeling good.
LanguageData.DryadDied.stages.0.label: dryad died
LanguageData.DryadDied.stages.0.description: My tree's dryad is gone forever. You shall be missed, little one.
LanguageData.WillDiminished.stages.0.label: will diminished
LanguageData.FailedConvertAbilityInitiator.stages.0.d: I tried to convert someone and it didn't work out. Awkward.
LanguageData.FailedConvertAbilityRecipient.stages.0.d: Someone tried to convert me. I wish they'd just leave me alone.
LanguageData.Counselled.stages.0.label: counselled by {0}
LanguageData.Counselled.stages.0.description: I received counseling about something that's been bothering me.
LanguageData.CounselFailed.stages.0.label: failed consolation by {0}
LanguageData.CounselFailed.stages.0.description: Somehow, that attempt at helping made things even worse.
LanguageData.Counselled_MoodBoost.stages.0.label: counselled by {0}
LanguageData.Counselled_MoodBoost.stages.0.descriptio: I received counseling from someone. It felt nice to be listened to.
LanguageData.TendedByMedicalSpecialist.stages.0.label: tended by {0}
LanguageData.TendedByMedicalSpecialist.stages.0.descr: I received medical aid from one who carries the special healer status of my ideoligion.
LanguageData.ObservedTerror.stages.0.label: {THING_label}
LanguageData.ObservedGibbetCage.stages.0.label: observed gibbet cage
LanguageData.ObservedSkullspike.stages.0.label: observed skullspike
LanguageData.RelicAtRitual.stages.0.label: {RELICNAME} at ritual
LanguageData.RelicAtRitual.stages.1.label: two relics at ritual
LanguageData.RelicAtRitual.stages.1.description: Two relics were present during our ritual.
LanguageData.RelicAtRitual.stages.2.label: three relics at ritual
LanguageData.RelicAtRitual.stages.2.description: Three relics were present during our ritual.
LanguageData.RitualDelayed.stages.0.label: {RITUAL_labelCap} delayed
LanguageData.RitualDelayed.stages.0.description: {RITUAL_labelCapDef} has been delayed. We should have started it already.
LanguageData.TrialExonerated.stages.0.label: exonerated
LanguageData.TrialExonerated.stages.0.description: They had nothing on me, and I showed them!
LanguageData.TrialFailed.stages.0.label: failed trial
LanguageData.TrialFailed.stages.0.description: I made an accusation and couldn't even make it stick. This is humiliating.
LanguageData.TrialConvicted.stages.0.label: convicted
LanguageData.TrialConvicted.stages.0.description: I was unjustly convicted of a terrible wrongdoing!
LanguageData.TerribleParty.stages.0.label: terrible party
LanguageData.TerribleParty.stages.0.description: That party was terrible. Bad music, awkward dancing... ugh.
LanguageData.BoringParty.stages.0.label: boring party
LanguageData.BoringParty.stages.0.description: That party was not good. Uninteresting music, poor dancing. Wish I never went.
LanguageData.FunParty.stages.0.label: fun party
LanguageData.FunParty.stages.0.description: That was a fun party. A good break from daily life.
LanguageData.UnforgettableParty.stages.0.label: unforgettable party
LanguageData.UnforgettableParty.stages.0.description: That party was awesome! The music, the mood... Everything was perfect.
LanguageData.TerribleFuneral.stages.0.label: disgraceful funeral
LanguageData.TerribleFuneral.stages.0.description: That funeral was borderline insulting to everyone involved.
LanguageData.LacklusterFuneral.stages.0.label: lackluster funeral
LanguageData.LacklusterFuneral.stages.0.description: That funeral was really uninspired and didn't resolve anything.
LanguageData.GoodFuneral.stages.0.label: good funeral
LanguageData.GoodFuneral.stages.0.description: That funeral went well - a good way to say goodbye.
LanguageData.HeartwarmingFuneral.stages.0.label: heartwarming funeral
LanguageData.HeartwarmingFuneral.stages.0.description: That funeral went perfectly - it brought up a lot of good memories and showed us a path forward.
LanguageData.TerribleFestival.stages.0.label: terrible festival
LanguageData.TerribleFestival.stages.0.description: That festival was horrible. I'm still cringing from the awkwardness flashbacks.
LanguageData.BoringFestival.stages.0.label: boring festival
LanguageData.BoringFestival.stages.0.description: That festival was awkward. I wish I could have left.
LanguageData.FunFestival.stages.0.label: fun festival
LanguageData.FunFestival.stages.0.description: I had fun! We got to hang out and relax.
LanguageData.UnforgettableFestival.stages.0.label: unforgettable festival
LanguageData.UnforgettableFestival.stages.0.descripti: That festival was something I'll never forget.
LanguageData.TerribleSacrifice.stages.0.label: terrible sacrifice
LanguageData.TerribleSacrifice.stages.0.description: That sacrifice was botched and the mood was way off. What an awful, awkward death.
LanguageData.BoringSacrifice.stages.0.label: boring sacrifice
LanguageData.BoringSacrifice.stages.0.description: That sacrifice lacked passion and the technique wasn't great.
LanguageData.SatisfyingSacrifice.stages.0.label: satisfying sacrifice
LanguageData.SatisfyingSacrifice.stages.0.description: That sacrifice was satisfying - well-executed and appropriately bloody.
LanguageData.SpectacularSacrifice.stages.0.label: spectacular sacrifice
LanguageData.SpectacularSacrifice.stages.0.descriptio: The blood! The release! That sacrifice made me feel like we were connecting with another world.
LanguageData.TerribleSkyLanterns.stages.0.label: terrible skylantern festival
LanguageData.TerribleSkyLanterns.stages.0.description: I hated having to make that skylantern, and they looked like garbage anyway.
LanguageData.UnimpressiveSkyLanterns.stages.0.label: boring skylanterns
LanguageData.UnimpressiveSkyLanterns.stages.0.descrip: Those skylanterns didn't impress me. Just a waste of time and resources.
LanguageData.BeautifulSkyLanterns.stages.0.label: beautiful skylantern festival
LanguageData.BeautifulSkyLanterns.stages.0.descriptio: I felt at peace as the lanterns drifted off.
LanguageData.UnforgettableSkyLanterns.stages.0.label: unforgettable skylantern festival
LanguageData.UnforgettableSkyLanterns.stages.0.descri: The sense of togetherness during construction, the moment of release - it was like my troubles drifted away with those skylanterns.
LanguageData.TerribleScarification.stages.0.label: terrible scarification
LanguageData.TerribleScarification.stages.0.descripti: The scarification was botched and the mood was way off. What an awkward ceremony.
LanguageData.BoringScarification.stages.0.label: boring scarification
LanguageData.BoringScarification.stages.0.description: That scarification lacked passion and the technique wasn't great.
LanguageData.SatisfyingScarification.stages.0.label: satisfying scarification
LanguageData.SatisfyingScarification.stages.0.descrip: That scarification was satisfying - cleanly-traced and appropriately painful-looking.
LanguageData.SpectacularScarification.stages.0.label: spectacular scarification
LanguageData.SpectacularScarification.stages.0.descri: The flesh curled and shapes like magic under the knife. It was a true transformation through suffering!
LanguageData.TerribleBlinding.stages.0.label: terrible blinding
LanguageData.TerribleBlinding.stages.0.description: That blinding was botched and the mood was way off. What an awkward ceremony.
LanguageData.BoringBlinding.stages.0.label: boring blinding
LanguageData.BoringBlinding.stages.0.description: That blinding lacked passion and the technique wasn't great.
LanguageData.SatisfyingBlinding.stages.0.label: satisfying blinding
LanguageData.SatisfyingBlinding.stages.0.description: That blinding was satisfying. The cut was deep and made a satisfying wet-sucking noise.
LanguageData.SpectacularBlinding.stages.0.label: spectacular blinding
LanguageData.SpectacularBlinding.stages.0.description: The intoned voices, the terrible and amazing blade, the painful shivering and cutting - That blinding ceremony was sublime!
LanguageData.EffectiveConversion.stages.0.label: effective conversion
LanguageData.EffectiveConversion.stages.0.description: That conversion ritual went well. The speech was stirring and enjoyable to listen to.
LanguageData.MasterfulConversion.stages.0.label: masterful conversion
LanguageData.MasterfulConversion.stages.0.description: Masterful! Old beliefs were left in tatters, and our true knowledge was accepted without a shadow of a doubt.
LanguageData.TerribleDuel.stages.0.label: terrible duel
LanguageData.TerribleDuel.stages.0.description: That duel was horrible. I'm still cringing thinking about the bumbling cowardice.
LanguageData.BoringDuel.stages.0.label: boring duel
LanguageData.BoringDuel.stages.0.description: That duel was awkward. No aggressive energy, just attempts to survive.
LanguageData.GoodDuel.stages.0.label: good duel
LanguageData.GoodDuel.stages.0.description: That duel was good. The fighters really showed heart.
LanguageData.UnforgettableDuel.stages.0.label: unforgettable duel
LanguageData.UnforgettableDuel.stages.0.description: The courage... the blood... the death... I could never forget that.
LanguageData.AwkwardExecution.stages.0.label: awkward execution
LanguageData.AwkwardExecution.stages.0.description: That execution was awkward. The incompetence on display made the whole thing feel unjustified.
LanguageData.SatisfyingExecution.stages.0.label: satisfying execution
LanguageData.SatisfyingExecution.stages.0.description: That execution was satisfying. It felt like justice was served.
LanguageData.SpectacularExecution.stages.0.label: spectacular execution
LanguageData.SpectacularExecution.stages.0.descriptio: That execution was electrifying! Never have I felt such a sensation of justice being served.
LanguageData.LookChangeDesired.stages.0.label: look change desired
LanguageData.LookChangeDesired.stages.0.description: The way I look doesn't match who I am today. I want to change it.
LanguageData.MasochistWearingCollar.stages.0.label: masochist collared
LanguageData.MasochistWearingBodyStrap.stages.0.label: masochist body strapped
LanguageData.MasochistWearingBodyStrap.stages.0.descr: The straps press in and calm my soul.
LanguageData.WearingColor_Favorite.stages.0.label: wearing favorite color
LanguageData.WearingColor_Ideo.stages.0.label: wearing ideoligion color
LanguageData.WearingColor_Ideo.stages.0.description: My apparel coloring is properly expressing my beliefs.
LanguageData.FailedConvertIdeoAttemptResentment.stage: Someone tried to convert me. I hate being proselytized this way.
These thoughts coming from the structure, they open doors to such vastness... I feel so small that I might disappear.
I can feel the edge of its wordless whispers... They make me uneasy.
It makes me perceive so much. Eyeless knowledge of absolute existence, all minds speaking and dying and birthing at once. It's hard not to lose connection with myself.
It pays no attention to me but I sense the edge of its perception. Flashes of terrifying timeless sight. Hard to ignore.
LanguageData.PsychicArchotechEmanator_Core.stages.0.d: The scale of it. The fractal logic-scape of the multiversal hyperplane. No distance. No time. No me or them. I'm everything. I'm nothing.
LanguageData.PsychicArchotechEmanator_Core.stages.1.d: I can feel the edge of its thoughts, see the endless scope when I close my eyes. I need to focus on my physical body or I drift away.
